data.name: Fried Chicken in Wonderland
data.detailed_description:
The second story of The Passionate Insane City Series.


Prologue
Fried Gatsby, who is a fried chicken, is chased by police because he became a drug suspect. Running away from cops, he dives into a sewer. But the sewer was much deeper than he thought and he fell constantly. Soon, he reaches the unknown world, The Heart Kingdom in Wonderland. But he has to be careful. Although he succeeded running away from the cops, more terrifying and dangerous things may be waiting for him. Because this country is in a civil war.

But it never knows, he might meet a new good relationship here, in the war between Playing cards. Anyway, he should do anything for his future, whatever his future becomes.



Welcome to Heart Kingdom, and enjoy the madness.





Feature
This Side view action game includes Boss Raids as the main content. Gatsby who is a dancer as a job will fight the enemies using his some extreme dancing skills, in Dubstep, Rock, or Cinematic BGM.

The boss enemies have weapons or battle skills to match their personalities and tastes, respectively. Gatsby may be able to take away their weapons or something valuables and use them after knock down them. The items will be helpful in the battles and help readers achieve Steam achievements. Readers can challenge reading the story as the highest difficulty when they finish reading the story with the normal difficulty. Gatsby can get unique items of bosses easier at the stages.

Gatsby will know the stories of people living in Wonderland. And as the story progresses, he may have new companions.

data.short_description: This is a story about a guy who loves his girlfriend and Parmesan cheese powder.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad core (Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2450M)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad core (Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2450M)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 555M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
